TipDesc[1]: Distribute electricity in team will increase the team's BP, activating Perfect Tactics
TipDesc[2]: Clear prestage will eliminate partial Enhanced Affix of Deep Hive
TipDesc[3]: You can use the Support Character borrowed from Friends/Command Bureau for Fight

TipDesc[1]: Team Level - Low Team Level. Please wait for and claim Daily Supplies to level up.
TipDesc[2]: Frame Specialty - Unactivated skill(s) or no suitable skill(s) activated on the current Specialty Path.
TipDesc[3]: Combat Strategy - Deploy frames flexibly and select suitable Specialty Paths and skills for them based on the situation on the battlefield.

TipDesc[2]: Tactics – Adjust positions and skill casting timing
TipDesc[3]: The [Reset] function will return the materials spent on your mechanoid.

TipDesc[1]: Team – Deploy characters that effectively counter the enemies
TipDesc[2]: Buff – Adjust and activate different Simulation Buff effects
TipDesc[3]: Star – Obtain the most Stars possible

TipDesc[1]: Combat Deployment - Try to prepare for the winter hunt./Adjust the configuration of combat enhancements.
TipDesc[2]: Winter Hunt Preparation - Change talents or replace/upgrade Defensive Devices.
TipDesc[3]: Combat Enhancement - Change hunters or replace/upgrade hunting add-ons.

TipDesc[1]: Construct - The training level is too low. You need to improve your character's Battle Power.
TipDesc[2]: Team Lineup - Your team is missing some types of characters.
TipDesc[3]: Affix Too Difficult - Make sure to choose Affixes wisely so that you can keep the Affix Difficulty low.

TipDesc[1]: Adjust the appropriate Deviation to improve accuracy.
TipDesc[2]: Press once the light reaches the white line
TipDesc[3]: Press according to the rhythm of the notes

TipDesc[1]: Bombs of different colors are in correspondence with explosions in different areas
TipDesc[2]: Analyze explosion patterns based on the colors of the bombs in each round
TipDesc[3]: Keep a proper distance with allies to hack the bombs

TipDesc[1]: Avoid the obstacles to run farther
TipDesc[2]: The acceleration zone can make your frame run faster

TipDesc[1]: Bombs of different colors are related to explosions of different areas
TipDesc[2]: Avoid the explosions caused by boss' bombs in advance
TipDesc[3]: Hit the boss with bombs to earn points
